title: Help needed identifying a font!
content:
Does anyone know the name of the font being used in the attached image? It’s being used for the word “CREW”.

If not, does anyone know where I can get a look-a-like font, preferably for free!

Mucho gracias!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [american-crew-fiber\_h.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121185743/http:/typophile.com/files/american-crew-fiber_h.jpg) | 30.94 KB |

 [‹ Type suggestion - Vintage Outdoor](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121185743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47951 "Go to previous forum topic") [IVR ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121185743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48057 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nintendy

comments.content:
[Bodega Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121185743/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8LU).

And next time please use the [Type-ID-board](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121185743/http:/typophile.com/forum/29) for these things …
sorry renko, i’m new to this forum. thanks for your help
